name: Off Road 4x4
description:
This is an Off Road game, not an arcade car race game! You can try old American and East European army cars, SUVs, off road cars in realistic open levels. The red arrow help to you to find the best way. In the multiplayer section available 6 single player levels to head to head multiplayer race.

Features:
12 Single player levels.
6 Head to head multiplayer levels
10+1 Different cars with different setup.
Open Levels to find the best way.
Wheel and cockpit camera.
Working dashboard.
Deformable cars.
Realistic car physics.
GameCenter
